attributes.action: UN to send peace keeping troops to protect AL Aqsa mosque and worshipers inside.
attributes.additional_details: To save lives and bring some stabilising factor to the region.
attributes.background: UK government to call on the United Nations to immediately send peace keeping troops to protect AL Aqsa mosque and worshipers inside. Also to send peace keeping troops to to protect Palestinian property on the occupied lands from being stolen by the Israeli settlers and army.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586198
